Articles.Content: Hello! i can't find a mod that adds more lights (like illuminator mk1-mk2 but different shapes). i've checked "aviation lights" mod but i'm not sure if that what i'm looking for. I'm looking for lights to put on my rover to illuminate my path at night.
surface lights; B9 also has a few lights
Thanks. I tested it and it's to illuminate vessels, not terrain (short distances). And B9 is way too big for me right now... and i think is not compatible with 0.24.2.

B.Dynamics has a nice turret mounted spotlight that you can aim with the mouse...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341-24-2-B-Dynamics-Retracting-vectoring-engines-etc-v1-1-1-%28Aug-11%29

There were also a couple of good, very small ones in the old "Escape Pod" mod but I can't find a link to that one any more. One was a very small spotlight, the other was a revolving beacon... very cool.

Edited August 21, 2014 by gmiddlemass

have you tried Aviation Light?

Yes, but i need spotlights- flashlight to illuminate terrain, not surfaces of my vessel-rover.

B.Dynamics has a nice turret mounted spotlight that you can aim with the mouse...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341-24-2-B-Dynamics-Retracting-vectoring-engines-etc-v1-1-1-%28Aug-11%29

There were also a couple of good, very small ones in the old "Escape Pod" mod but I can't find a link to that one any more. One was a very small spotlight, the other was a revolving beacon... very cool.

That's cool, i'll check that!. Thanks.
